DataElement.preferredName: Person Bone Marrow Eye Biopsy Specimen Related Cancer Research Consent Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to the consent and collection of bone marrow or eye biopsy specimens used in cancer research.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Bone Marrow Eye Biopsy Specimen Related Cancer Research Consent
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to consent and collection of bone marrow or eye biopsy specimens used in cancer research.

Property.preferredName: Bone Marrow Eye Biopsy Specimen Relationship Cancer Research Consent
Property.preferredDefinition: The tissue occupying the spaces of bone. It consists of blood vessel sinuses and a network of hematopoietic cells which give rise to the red cells, white cells, and megakaryocytes. :The organ of sight or vision.:Removal and pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue from the living body.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.:Related; connected or associated.:No Value Exists:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: The tissue occupying the spaces of bone. It consists of blood vessel sinuses and a network of hematopoietic cells which give rise to the red cells, white cells, and megakaryocytes.
The organ of sight or vision.
The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.
Systematic investigation into the causes of cancer and development of strategies for prevention, diagnosis, treatment, and cure.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: My bone marrow/eye biopsy may
ReferenceDocuments.description: My bone marrow/eye biopsy may be kept for use in research to learn about, prevent, or treat cancer.
